LOGIN
JION

Deposit Bonus

Home » Promotions » deposit bonus

Deposit Now & Enjoy Extra 3% Bonus!

Promotion Details:
At Jiliaaa, we’re dedicated to enhancing your gaming journey right from the start. With our latest promotion, every deposit not only brings you closer to your next big win but also rewards you with something extra. Here’s everything you need to know about our “Deposit Now & Enjoy Extra 3% Bonus” offer.

Eligibility: This promotion is open to all registered Jiliaaa members. New to Jiliaaa? Sign up today to participate in this exciting offer.

Offer: Receive an additional 3% bonus on your deposit, giving you more opportunities to play and win across our extensive selection of JILI slots and online casino games.

Example:
Deposit ₱10,000 and get a total amount of ₱10,300. Minimum deposit of ₱100 or more, Top up with Paymaya  Bonus will automatically transfer to your account.
Click Statement > Promotion to check your Bonus, No Extra Fee! 3x turnover to withdraw!

Note:
Paymaya  minimum deposit of ₱100.

Terms and Conditions:

1. Players needs completed turnover only able to withdraw the bonus.
2.Only one account per player is allowed. Same IP address, Bank Account, and Contact Number are not allowed. Players with multiple or fraudulent accounts will not be eligible for this promotion.
3.When players use promotional bonuses for game bets, they will not receive any rebate on the bonus bet amount, but the withdrawal turnover will be calculated normally.
4. JILIAAA reserves the right to revoke all bonuses given to any member if they are found to be abusing this promotion.
5. JILIAAA reserves the right to amend or cancel this promotion at any time.
6. The JILIAAA General Terms and Conditions apply.
